name: Roguestar
description:
Roguestar

It is a roguelite game where, you will explore diverse rooms in a dungeon and fight enemies in order to find your way out of it.

Furthermore this game features two different characters with contrasted playstyles so you should play both of them.

How to play

Movement -> WASD or arrow keys.

Attack 1 -> J.

Attack 2 -> K.

Attack 3 -> L.

Credits

-JPCard | Programming, Game Design, Art.

-Nahuel Mariño | Programming, Game Design, Art.

Music tracks: 

+ 'Adventure Begins (CC-BY)'

+ 'EZDNB2 (CC-BY)'

+ 'Dark Ritual [v2] (CC-BY)'

+ 'Epic Departure [v2] (CC-BY)'

All of the above tracks by Of Far Different Nature
